content: My name is Gayoung Ko (고가영). I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Economics at the University of Virginia, where I am advised by Prof. Simon Anderson and Prof. Gaurab Aryal. Previously, I worked at LG Economic Research Institute as a researcher, and obtained my M.A. and B.A. in Economics from Korea University. My research interests primarily focus on industrial organization, labor and education economics.

title: "Ga Young" Ko
